front_home.newsletter_sub: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest updates
front_home.happy_support: We are happy to provide direct assistance to you
front_home.inq_desc: Answers to the most frequently asked questions about the affiliate marketing program

affiliate.hero_paragraph: Join our affiliate program and earn lifetime commissions for every successful referral.
affiliate.steps_content: Start earning in just three simple steps.
affiliate.steps_card1_content: Create your affiliate account in minutes.
affiliate.steps_card2_content: Share your referral link and promote our services.
affiliate.steps_card3_content: Get paid for every customer you refer.
affiliate.prog_content: We provide one of the most competitive affiliate programs in the market.
affiliate.prog_card2_text: Attractive offers with high conversion rates.
affiliate.prog_card3_text: Our team is always here to support you.
affiliate.prog_card4_text: Grow and succeed together with us.
